data.translation: Hi siku ra 15 ku ya eka 17 wa December 2016,
data.original_reference: Hi Musumbhunuku, Sara Danius, matsalana wa nkarhi hinkwawo wa Komiti ya Nobel eka Matsalwa le Swedish Academy, u tivise erivaleni eka nongonoko wa xiyanimoya eka Sveriges Radio le Sweden a vula leswaku komiti, tanihi leswi a yi nga swi koti ku fikelela Bob Dylan hi ku kongoma malunghana ni ku hlula kakwe Sagwadi ra Nobel eka Matsalwa hi 2016, yi tshikile matshalatshala lawa a yi ma endla yo n’wi kuma.
data.corrected_reference: Hi Musumbhunuku, Sara Danius, matsalana wa nkarhi hinkwawo wa Komiti ya Nobel eka Matsalwa le Swedish Academy, u tivisile erivaleni eka nongonoko wa xiyanimoya eka Sveriges Radio le Sweden a vula leswaku komiti, tanihi leswi a yi nga swi koti ku fikelela Bob Dylan hi ku kongoma malunghana ni ku hlula kakwe Sagwadi ra Nobel eka Matsalwa hi 2016, yi tshikile matshalatshala lawa a yi ma endla yo n’wi kuma.

data.translation: Danius u te, "" Endzhaku ka nkarhi a hi nge swi end
data.original_reference: Danius u te, “Sweswi a hi endli nchumu. Ndzi be riqingho ni ku rhumela tiimeyili eka mupfuni wakwe la nga ekusuhi naswona ndzi kume tinhlamulo ta kahle. Sweswi, sweswo swi ringene hakunene.”
data.corrected_reference: Danius u te, "Sweswi a hi endli nchumu. Ndzi be riqingho ndzi tlhela ndzi rhumela tiimeyili  eka mutirhi-kulobye lonkulu naswona ndzi kume tinhlamulo ta xinghana. Swa sweswi, sweswo swi ringene".

data.translation: USA Gymnastics yi pfuna vuhundzuluxeri bya United States Olympic Committee naswona yi amukele
data.original_reference: USA Gymnastics yi seketela papila ra United States Olympic Committee ni ku amukela xilaveko lexikulu xa leswaku ndyangu wa Olympic wu hlohlotela mbango lowu sirhelelekeke eka vatlangi lavan’wana hinkwavo.

data.translation: Hi pfumelelana ni marito ya USOC ya leswaku swirho swa hina swa ku fambisa swirho
data.original_reference: Hi pfumelelana ni marito ya USOC ya leswaku leswi pfunaka vatlangi ni swipano swa hina, ni mitlangu ya vona, swi nga vuyeriwa ku antswa hi ku endla ku cinca lokunene eka nhlangano wa hina, ematshan’weni yo teka timfanelo.
data.corrected_reference: Hi pfumelelana ni marito ya USOC ya leswaku leswi pfunaka vatlangi ni swipano swa hina, ni mitlangu ya vona, swi nga vuyeriwa ku antswa hi ku endla ku cinca lokunene eka nhlangano wa hina, ematshan’weni yo teka timfanelo.

data.translation: USA Gymnastics yi pfuna ku landzela xiboho lexi nga riki na munhu loyi a xi
data.original_reference: USA Gymnastics yi seketela vulavisisi lebyi tiyimeleke lebyi nga ha paluxaka ndlela leyi ku tirhisiwa ko biha ka xiyenge lexi hlamuseriwaka hi xivindzi hi lava poneke eka Larry Nassar leswi vangeke ku honisiwa ka swona nkarhi wo leha ni ku amukela ku cinca kwihi ni kwihi loku lavekaka ni loku faneleke.
data.corrected_reference: USA Gymnastics yi seketela vulavisisi lebyi tiyimeleke lebyi nga ha paluxaka ndlela leyi ku tirhiswaka vubihi ka xiyenge lexi hlamuseriwaka hi vuendzi hi lava poneke eka Larry Nassar leswi vangeke ku honisiwa ka swona nkarhi wo leha ni ku amukela ku cinca kwihi ni kwihi loku lavekaka ni loku faneleke.

data.translation: Gymnastics ya le USA na USOC va ni xivangelo xin'wana ni xin
data.original_reference: USA Gymnastics na USOC ti na pakani leyi fanaka — ku endla ntlangu wa ti-gymnastic, ni yin’wana, yi hlayiseka hilaha swi nga kotekaka hakona eka vatlangi leswaku va landzela milorho ya vona eka mbango lowu hlayisekeke, lowunene ni lowu va nyikaka matimba.
data.corrected_reference: USA Gymnastics na USOC ti na pakani leyi fanaka — ku endla ntlangu wa ti-gymnastic, ni yin’wana, yi hlayiseka hilaha swi nga kotekaka hakona eka vatlangi leswaku va landzela milorho ya vona eka ndhawu leyi hlayisekeke, leyinene ni leyi va nyikaka matimba.

data.original_reference: Emalembeni ya va-1960, Brzezinski u tirhele John F. Kennedy tanihi mutsundzuxi wakwe ivi a tirhela vufambisi bya Lyndon B. Johnson.

data.translation: Loko a khethiwa hi 1976 u byele Carter hi xiyenge xa le xi
data.original_reference: Enkarhini wa nhlawulo wa 1976 u tsundzuxe Carter hi ta pholisi ya matikomambe, ivi a tirha tanihi National Security Advisor (NSA) ku sukela hi 1977 ku ya ka 1981, a tlhandlama Henry Kissinger.
data.corrected_reference: Enkarhini wa nhlawulo wa 1976 u tsundzuxe Carter hi ta pholisi ya matikomambe, ivi a tirha tanihi National Security Advisor (NSA) ku sukela hi 1977 ku ya ka 1981, a tlhandlama Henry Kissinger.

data.translation: Loko a ri NSA, u pfune Carter ku lawula swiyimo swa le tikweni
data.original_reference: Tanihi NSA, u pfune Carter eku tameleni timhaka misava hi vutswatsi, tanihi Camp David Accords, 1978; a hlela vuxaka exikarhi ka US–China emalembeni ya le ku heleni ka va-1970; Hundzuluko wa Iran, loyi vangeke hasahasa ya mpfalelo wa Iran, hi 1979; swin’we ni ku hlasela ka Soviet le Afghanistan, hi 1979.
data.corrected_reference: Tanihi NSA, u pfune Carter eku fambiseni ka timhaka  ta misava hi vutswatsi, tanihi Camp David Accords, 1978; a hlela vuxaka exikarhi ka US–China emalembeni ya le ku heleni ka va-1970; Hundzuluko wa tiko ra  Iran, la ha ku vangeke hasahasa ni ku khomiwa hi tihanyi e tikweni ra Iran, hi 1979; swin’we ni ku hlasela ka Soviet le Afghanistan, hi 1979.

data.translation: Ku vula leswaku a ku na munhu la nga ta sirhelela leswaku ku endla yini na yini e
data.original_reference: Yi lemukisa leswaku ku hava loyi a nga nyikaka xitiyisiso xa leswaku goza rihi ni rihi ra Iraq sweswi ri ta herisa nkwetlembetano sweswi ri ta yimisa nkwetlembetano wa mpambukwa, madzolonga lama engetelekaka, kumbe mboyamelo wo pfuxa hasahasa.

data.translation: Murhangeri wa vumbirhi wa tiko ra Argentina, Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner, u
data.original_reference: Murhanga wa sweswi tlhelo Manana wo Sungula wa le Argentina ku nga Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner u tivisile ku nghenela ku hlawuriwa ku va muungameri tolo nimadyambu le La Plata, eka dorobakulu leri nga empfhukeni wa tikhilomitara ta 50 (31 wa timayili) ku suka eBuenos Aires.
data.corrected_reference: Murhanga wa sweswi tlhelo Manana wo Sungula wa le Argentina ku nga Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner u tivisile ku nghenela nhlawulo wa ku rhangela tiko tolo nimadyambu le La Plata, eka dorobakulu leri nga empfhukeni wa tikhilomitara ta 50 (31 wa timayili) ku suka eBuenos Aires.

data.translation: Mrs Kirchner u byele leswaku u lava ku ya tirha tanihi murhangeri eTheatre ya Argentina
data.original_reference: Man. Kirchner u tivisile xikongomelo xakwe xa ku yimela ku langiwa ku va muungameri eka Thiyetara ya Argentina, ndhawu yona leyi a yi tirhiseleke ku sungula tsima rakwe ra 2005 ra Sinethara tanihi xirho xa nhlawulo wa xifundzha wa Buenos Aires.
data.corrected_reference: Man. Kirchner u tivisile xikongomelo xa yena xa ku yimela ku hlawuriwa ka xiyenge xa vurhangeri bya tiko eka Thiyetara ya Argentina, ndhawu leyi a yi tirhiseke ku simeka pfhumba ra yena ra nhlawulo hi 2005 ra Sinethara tanihi xirho xa nhlawulo wa xifundzha wa Buenos Aires.

data.translation: Ku hlanganisiwa ka swona ku ve ni xivutiso hi ku tirhisiwa ka mali eka ku
data.original_reference: Nkanerisano wu pfuxiwe hi nkwetlembetano wa mali leyi tirhisiweke ni ku akiwa vuntshwa endzhaku ka ku tlhekeka ka Bubutsa ra Katrina; laha van’wana lava nga ni mavonelo ya vona va endleke mafenya hi ku vula leswaku i "Nxaviselo Lowuntshwa wa Bush le New Orleans."
data.corrected_reference: Nkanerisano wu pfuxiwe hi nkwetlembetano mayelana na ku tirhisiwa ka swa timali ta mphalalo na ku pfuxeta endzhaku ka Xidzedze xa Katrina; laha van’wana lava nga ni mavonelo ya vona va endleke mafenya hi ku vula leswaku i "Nxaviselo Lowuntshwa wa Bush le New Orleans."

data.translation: Ku landzela milawu ya le henhla ka ku fambisa swirho swa nhlangano wa swirho

data.corrected_reference: Ku sola ka ntshunxeko ka matshalatshala yo pfuxeta ku kongomisiwile eka ku nyikiwa ka tikontiraka to pfuxeta eka vanhu lava tekiwaka vari vatirhi va le ndzeni ka Washington.

data.translation: Vaaki va timhaka ta masangu va tirhe xiboho xa FBI xa khale xa ku

data.translation: Murhangeri wa tiko Stephen Harper u rhumele 'Clean Air Act' ya
data.original_reference: Holobyenkulu Stephen Harper u pfumerile ku rhumela ‘Nawu wa Moya wo Tenga’ wa hulumendhe eka komiti ya mavandla hinkwawo ku wu kambisisa, emahlweni ko va wu hlayiwa ravumbirhi, endzhaku ka nhlangano wa timinete ta 25 wa Ravumbirhi swin’we na murhangeri wa NDP ku nga Jack Layton eka PMO.
data.corrected_reference: Holobyenkulu Stephen Harper u pfumerile ku rhumela ‘Nawu wa Moya wo Tenga’ wa hulumendhe eka komiti ya mavandla hinkwawo ku wu kambisisa, ku nga si fika ku hlayiwa ra vumbirhi,endzhaku ka nhlengeletano wa timinete ta 25 hi ravumbiri na murhangeri wa NDP Jack Layton eka PMO

data.translation: Layton u byele leswaku ku ta endliwa ku cinca eka xiyenge xa le henhla xa xiyenge
data.original_reference: Layton a a komberile ku cinciwa ka papila ra nawu ra mbango ra lava lavaka vulawuri byo va na swipimelo hi nkarhi wa nhlangano siwn’we na PM, a kombela "ku tsariwa vuntshwa hi ku hetiseka " ka nawu wa mbango wa vandla ro fuma hi Swipimelo.
data.corrected_reference: Layton a kombela leswaku ku cinciwa nawu wa mbango wa vandla ra lava lavaka vulawuri hi nkarhi wa nhlangano na PM, a kombela "ku tsariwa vuntshwa hi ku hetiseka " ka nawu wa mbango wa vandla ro fuma hi Swipimelo.

data.translation: Ku sukela loko Huvo ya le henhla yi fike yi lawula ku tirhisiwa ka mali
data.original_reference: Ku sukela loko Hulumendhe Federalii yi sungula ku lawula timali eka xibedlhela xa Mersey le Devonport, Tasmania, hulumendhe ya mfumo na ti-MP tin’wana ta federali va sole xiendlo lexi tanihi ndlela yo kavenyeta nhlawulo lowu nga ta endliwa hi Hukuri.
data.corrected_reference: Ku sukela loko Hulumendhe Federalii yi sungula ku lawula timali eka xibedlhela xa Mersey le Devonport, Tasmania, mfumo wa xifundzha ni swirho swin'wana swa Palamende ya Federal swi sole xiendlo lexi tanihi ndlela yo kavenyeta nhlawulo lowu nga ta endliwa hi Hukuri.

data.translation: Kambe Murhangeri wa vulawuri John Howard u te leswaku xiboho lexi a xi ri xa ku
data.original_reference: Kambe Holobyenkulu John Howard u vule leswaku xiendlo xo sirhelela miako yo tirhisiwa ya xibedlhela leswaku yi nga yisiwa ehansi hi hulumendhe ya Tasmania, hi ku nyika mali leyi engetelekeke ya AUD$45 wa timiliyoni.
data.corrected_reference: Kambe Holobye-nkulu John Howard u vule leswaku xiendlo lexi a ku ri ku sirhelela miako ya xibedlhele leswaku yi nga hungutiwi hi hulumendhe ya le Tasmania, hi ku nyika mali leyi engetelekeke ya AUD$45 wa timiliyoni.

data.translation: Ku ya hi xihondzo xo sungula, ku hlaya ka xivandzana xa le lwandle
data.original_reference: Hikuya hi mahungu ya sweswinyana, mipimo ya lwandle yi kombe leswaku tsunami a yi tlhekekile. Hakunene a ku ri ni xiendlakalo xa tsunami leyi rhekhodiweke ekusuhi na Pago Pago na Niue.
data.corrected_reference: Hikuya hi mahungu ya sweswinyana,mpimo wa mati elwandle wu kombise leswaku ku ve ni tsunami. A ku ri ni ku tsekatseka lokukulu ka misava loku tsarisiweke ekusuhi na Pago Pago na Niue.

data.translation: A ku ri na ku hlaselwa kumbe ku hlaselwa lokukulu loku tsariweke e Tonga
data.original_reference: Ku hava ku onhaka kumbe ku vaviseka loku vikiweke le Tonga, kambe gezi ri tsemekile nkarhinyana, leswi hi xiviko swi siveleke valawuri va le Tonga ku amukela ku humesiwa ka xilemukiso xa tsunami hi PTWC.
data.corrected_reference: Ku hava ku onhaka kumbe ku vaviseka loku vikiweke e tikweni ra Tonga, kambe gezi ri tsemiwile swa xinkarhana, leswi ku vikiweke leswaku swi sivele valawuri va le Tonga ku amukela xilemukiso xa tsunami lexi humesiweke hi PTWC

data.translation: "A hi byerile hi ku helela (Wales) ku suka eku sunguleni
data.original_reference: "Kahlekahle [Wales] u hi hemberile ku sukela eku sunguleni. Xo sungula, hi ku endla onge leswi a swi va swivangelo swa nawu. Xa vumbirhi, hi ku endla onge wa hi yingisa, ku ya eku vekeriweni etlhelo."
data.corrected_reference: Kahlekahle [Wales] u hi hemberile ku sukela eku sunguleni. Xo sungula, hi ku endla onge leswi a swi va swivangelo swa nawu. Xa vumbirhi, hi ku endla onge wa hi yingisa, ku ya eku vekeriweni etlhelo.

data.translation: Va nga vona kahle swinene hi ku nwa ni ku vona hi n'hweti, naswona va famba
data.original_reference: Swi vona kahle nivusiku naswona swa tivonela leswaku swi nga voniwi. Ti-ocelot ti hlota hi ku ti fanisa na ndhawu leyi swihari leswi ti swi dyaka swi tshamaka eka yona leswaku endzhaku ka nkarhi ti swi khoma hi ku hatlisa.

data.translation: Muhammad a a lava ku tiva hi vukheta swilo leswi nga ehansi ka vutomi bya le tilweni

data.original_reference: Tanihi loko xi akiwe hi Vaegipta hi lembe-xidzana ra vunharhu BCE, Xihondzo Lexikulu i xin’wani xa miako ya swihondzo leyi nga akiwa ku dzunisa Faro la feke.

data.translation: Le Giza Plateau, kumbe "" Giza Necropolis "
data.original_reference: Timbala-ntshava ta Giza, kumbe “Giza Necropolis” a Nkoveni wa la va Feke wa le Egipta ti na swihondzo swo hlayanyana (leswi e ka swona xihondzo lexikulu ku nga xona lexikulu), masirha yo hlayanyana, ti tempele to hlayanyana, ni Xivandzana lexikulu.
data.corrected_reference: Timbala-ntshava ta Giza, kumbe “Giza Necropolis” a Nkoveni wa la va Feke wa le Egipta ti na swihondzo swo hlayanyana (leswi e ka swona xihondzo lexikulu ku nga xona lexikulu), masirha yo hlayanyana, ti tempele to hlayanyana, ni Xivandzana lexikulu.

data.translation: Pyramidi leyikulu yi endliwe leswaku yi kombisa rirhandzu ra Faro Khufu, naswona ti
data.original_reference: Xihondzo lexikulu xi endleriwe ku dzunisa Faro Khufu, ni swihondzo swin’wana swo tala leswitsongo, masirha, ni ti tempele ti akeriwe ku dzunisa vasati va Khufu ni va ndyangu.

data.translation: Ku ya ehansi swi vula leswaku u fanele u sungula eka xiphemu ni ku khoma xiphe
data.original_reference: A henhla swi vula leswaku u fanele ku sungula a yinhleni kutani u susumeta vurha, naswona a hansi swivula leswaku u fanele ku sungula a ncileni (ku nga laha voko ra wena ri khomaka vurha kona) kambe u koka vurha.

data.translation: Ndlela leyi humaka emakumu yi endla leswaku ririmi ri va ritsongo, loko ndlela leyi
data.original_reference: Kususumeta vurha swi endla mpfumawulo lowutsongo, loko ku koka vurha ku ni matimba swinene kambe ku ni nsusumeto.

data.translation: U nga ha vula leswaku u nga ringeta ku vula marito ya wena, kambe u nga ha
data.original_reference: Titwe u ntshunxekile ku tsala swikombiso swa wena hi pensele, kambe tsundzuka leswaku swikombiso swa vurha leswi nga kandziyisiwa swi kona hi xivangelo xa swa vuyimbeleri, hikokwalaho swi fanele ku hloniphiwa hi ntolovelo.

data.translation: Ku tikela ka King Louis XVI, Queen Marie Antoinette, vana va vona vambirhi
data.original_reference: Hosi Louis XVI loyi a chuhile, Nkosikazi Marie Antoinette ni vana va vona vambirhi lavatsongo (Marie Therese wa malembe ya-11 ni Louis-Charles wa malembe ya mune) ni makwavo wa xisati wa Hosi, Manana Elizabeth, hi 16 October 1789 va boheke ku vuyela a Paris ku suka a Versailles hi ntshungu wa vavasati va le makete.
data.corrected_reference: Hosi Louis XVI loyi a chuhile, Nkosikazi Marie Antoinette ni vana va vona vambirhi lavatsongo (Marie Therese wa malembe ya-11 ni Louis-Charles wa malembe ya mune) ni makwavo wa xisati wa Hosi, Manana Elizabeth, hi 16 October 1789 va boheke ku vuyela a Paris ku suka a Versailles hi ntshungu wa vavasati va le makete.

data.translation: Nkarhi lowu swilo leswi swi endlekeke eka wona a swi vula nkarhi wa le Middle Ages
data.original_reference: Nkarhi lowu swiendlakalo leswi swi nga humelela hi wona hi ntolovelo u vuriwa Malembe ya le Xikarhi ya le Henhla nkarhi wa matimu ya Yuropa hi malembe-xidzana ya vu-11,12 ni vu-13 (AD 1000–1300).

data.translation: Vukarhi bya le Middle Ages byi hundze hi vusiku bya Middle Ages naswona byi hun
data.original_reference: Malembe ya le Xikarhi ya le u Sunguleni a te emahlweni ka Malembe ya le Xikarhi ya le Henhla kambe ku landzela Malembe ya le Xikarhi ya Makumo, lama hi ntolovelo ma helaka kwalomu ka 1500.
data.corrected_reference: Malembe ya le Xikarhi ya le u Sunguleni a te emahlweni ka Malembe ya le Xikarhi ya le Henhla kambe ku landzela Malembe ya le Xikarhi ya Makumo, lama hi ntolovelo ma helaka kwalomu ka 1500.

data.translation: Determinism ya tinjiniya i rito leri nga ni misinya yo tala ya mikateko
data.original_reference: Ku pima hi ku tirhisa thekinoloji i rito leri katsaka mianakanyo yo tala ya matirhiselo, ku sukela eka vuqambhi bya thekinoloji kumbe nkoka wa thekinoloji eka miehleketo leyi vulaka leswaku vumundzuku bya vanhu byi lawuriwa hi vutlhari bya nkoka lebyi fambisanaka ni milawu ya sayense ni ku kombisiwa ka yona hi thekinoloji.
data.corrected_reference: Ku pima hi ku tirhisa thekinoloji i rito leri katsaka mianakanyo yo tala ya matirhiselo, ku sukela eka vuqambhi bya thekinoloji kumbe nkoka wa thekinoloji eka miehleketo leyi vulaka leswaku vumundzuku bya vanhu byi lawuriwa hi vutlhari bya nkoka lebyi fambisanaka ni milawu ya sayense ni ku kombisiwa ka yona hi thekinoloji.

data.translation: Ku hlamusela ka timfanelo ta ti teknoloji ti hlanganisa mikateko ya vumbirhi: leswaku
data.original_reference: Tinhlamuselo to tala to pima hi ku tirhisa thekinoloji ta fana hi mianakanyo yimbirhi ya ntolovelo: leswaku nhluvukiso wa thekinoloji wu landzela ntila lowu ngopfungopfu wu nga khumbiwiki hi nhlohlotelo wa ndhavuko kumbe politiki, nileswaku thekinoloji hi hala tlhelo yi “khumba” vanhu hi ndlela ya mfuwo, ematshan’weni yo kongomisiwa hi mahanyelo ya vanhu.
data.corrected_reference: Tinhlamuselo to tala to pima hi ku tirhisa thekinoloji ta fana hi mianakanyo yimbirhi ya ntolovelo: leswaku nhluvukiso wa thekinoloji wu landzela ntila lowu ngopfungopfu wu nga khumbiwiki hi nhlohlotelo wa ndhavuko kumbe politiki, nileswaku thekinoloji hi hala tlhelo yi “khumba” vanhu hi ndlela ya mfuwo, ematshan’weni yo kongomisiwa hi mahanyelo ya vanhu.

data.translation: Hambileswi, hi xikombiso, munhu a nga swi vula leswaku xikepe xi fanele xi endla
data.original_reference: Hi xikombiso, munhu a nga ha vula leswaku movha wu endla leswaku ku endliwa mapatu.
data.corrected_reference: Hi xikombiso, munhu a nga ha vula leswaku movha wu endla leswaku ku endliwa mapatu.

data.translation: Ku nga khathariseki sweswo, xiyenge xa tindlela ta tiko a xi nge he
data.original_reference: Hambiswiritano, ntila wa tiko wa mapatu a wu na vuyelo lebyi pfunaka hi ta ikhonomi eka mimovha, kutani maendlelo lamantshwa ya vumaki ma endliwa ku hunguta tihakelo ta ku va ni movha.

data.translation: Ku va ni timotoka ta vanhu vambirhi swi endla leswaku ku va ni tihuku ta tindlela
data.original_reference: Ku va ni mimovha yo tala swi tlhela swi vanga makhombo yo tala emapatwini, leswi vangelaka ku endliwa ka marhengu lamantshwa ya mpfuno wa rihanyo ku horisa mimiri leyi vavisekeke.

data.translation: Ku va ni nkhensa ku ni xiphemu lexikulu xa ku va ni ku rhula loku
data.original_reference: Vuromanticism a vu ri ni xiphemu lexikulu xa dyondzo ya leswaku munhu u vumbiwa hi ndhavuko wa yena, le yi nga tekiwa ka vatsari vo fana ni Goethe, Fichte, ni Schlegel.
data.corrected_reference: Vuromanticism a vu ri ni xiphemu lexikulu xa dyondzo ya leswaku munhu u vumbiwa hi ndhavuko wa yena, le yi nga tekiwa ka vatsari vo fana ni Goethe, Fichte, ni Schlegel.

data.translation: Hi ku ya hi Romanticism, xihondzo xo sungula xi endle leswaku vanhu va va
data.original_reference: A mongweni wa Vuromanticism, ndhawu yi vumba vanhu, kambe hi ku famba ka nkharhi mikhuva ni ndhavuko yo fambisana ni ndhawo yoleyo yi humelerile, kutani yona, hi ku pfumelana ni ndhawu ya vanhu, a yi antswa ku ni milawu leyi nga vekiwa ntsena.
data.corrected_reference: A mongweni wa Vuromanticism, ndhawu yi vumba vanhu, kambe hi ku famba ka nkharhi mikhuva ni ndhavuko yo fambisana ni ndhawo yoleyo yi humelerile, kutani yona, hi ku pfumelana ni ndhawu ya vanhu, a yi antswa ku ni milawu leyi nga vekiwa ntsena.

data.translation: eka nkarhi wa vukarhi bya Middle Ages Europe ya le henhla ya sungula ku endla swi
data.original_reference: Ku ya emakumu ya Malembe ya le Xikarhi Yuropa vupela-dyambu yi sungule ku endla xitayela xa yona. Wun’wani wa nhluvuko lowukulu wa nkarhi wa lowo hi xi vangelo xa tinyimpi ta nkutsulo vanhu va sungule ku tirhisa tikunupu ku boha swiambalo.

data.translation: Vutshunguri bya mavunwa i mavunwa lama endliwaka leswaku ku endliwa swakudya leswi engetelekeke

data.translation: Vutshunguri bya mavunwa i xivumbeko lexi nga riki na khombo, lexi nga ni
data.original_reference: Vurimi bya ku ti hanyisa i endlelo ro olova, hakanyingi ro kala tikhemikhali, la ku tirhisiwaka mbewu ya ndhawo yoleyo ku hlanganisiwa ni ku cinca-cinca swibyariwa kumbe tindlela tin’wana to olova ta ku humesa swo tala swinene.

data.translation: Hi siku rin'wana ni rin'wana, vanhu va ya eminhlanganweni
data.original_reference: Mixo wun’wana ni wun’wana, va nhu va siya ti doroba leti ntsongo hi ti movha ku ya eka tindhawu ta ntirho naswona va hindziwa hi timovha tin’wana ta vanhu lava va tirha eka tindhawu leti va ti siyeke.

data.translation: Hiku famba ka xikepe, munhu hinkwawo u fambisana ni, ni ku pfuna
data.original_reference: Eka swiyimo swa swilo leswi fambisaka vanhu leswi tshamaka swi cinca, vanhu hinkwavo va seketela swilo swa ku fambisa swa mimovha ya vanhu.
data.corrected_reference: Eka swiyimo swa swilo leswi fambisaka vanhu leswi tshamaka swi cinca, vanhu hinkwavo va seketela swilo swa ku fambisa swa mimovha ya vanhu.

data.translation: Swichudeni swa xibalo swi vula leswaku ku tirhisiwa ka tikarboni swi endle leswaku swi
data.original_reference: Sweswi sayense yi kombisa leswaku khaboni ikhonomi leyi nkulu yi suse swiyimo swa misava eka ndhawu ya yona leyi tiyeke leyi yi seketelaka ku ti endlekela ka vanhu eka timiliyoni ta malembe lama hundzuke.
data.corrected_reference: Sweswi sayense yi kombisa leswaku khaboni ikhonomi leyi nkulu yi suse swiyimo swa misava eka ndhawu ya yona leyi tiyeke leyi yi seketelaka ku ti endlekela ka vanhu eka timiliyoni ta malembe lama hundzuke.

data.translation: Vanhu hinkwavo va tirha hi matimba eka vanhu va vona, va tirhisa switirhisiwa swa vona swa ku
data.original_reference: Vanhu hinkwavo va hoxa boko emgangeni naswona vatirhisa ndlela leyi tirhisiwaka ya ku famba. Kwalomu ka vanhu hinkwavo va rila hi ti ndlela to famba ha tona.
data.corrected_reference: Vanhu hinkwavo va hoxa boko emgangeni naswona vatirhisa ndlela leyi tirhisiwaka ya ku famba. Kwalomu ka vanhu hinkwavo va rila hi ti ndlela to famba ha tona.

data.translation: Hi matiko lama endliwaka kahle, a wu nga ha ku tiva leswaku ku ni tingana leti fanaka
data.original_reference: Eka matiko lama fumeke swa kala ku twa vanhu la rilaka hi ku basa ka mati nayi kuwa ka tiboloho.
data.corrected_reference: Eka matiko lama fumeke swa kala ku twa vanhu la rilaka hi ku basa ka mati nayi kuwa ka tiboloho.

data.translation: Ha yini switirhisiwa swa ku ya emahlweni swi va ni tingana, ha yini swi nga ha
data.original_reference: Hikwalawokahini swilo swa ku fambisa vanhu swi tisa swirilo swo tano, hikwalawokahini swi tsandzeka masiku hinkwawo? Xana tinjineli swa swilo swa ku fambisa vanhu a va wu tivi ntirho wa vona? Kumbe ku na swin’wana leswi kulu leswi endlakaka?

data.translation: Ku famba ka timotoka i ku dyondza ku famba ka vatirhi va timotoka ni timotoka ta
data.original_reference: Dyondzo ya ku herisa nkwetlembetano yi dyondzo ya ndlela leyi vachayeri va timovha na mimovha va famba ha yona eka tindhawu timbirhi na ndlela leyi va tirhisana ha yona.
data.corrected_reference: Dyondzo ya ku herisa nkwetlembetano yi dyondzo ya ndlela leyi vachayeri va timovha na mimovha va famba ha yona eka tindhawu timbirhi na ndlela leyi va tirhisana ha yona.

data.translation: Hi xivindzi, ku dyondza hi ku famba ka timotoka swi nga endleka swi ri swinene
data.original_reference: Leswi tisaka ku vava hikuva, ku dyondza ndlela ya ku herisa nkwetlembetano swa tika hikuva awu nge yi vumbi hi ku tiyiseka ndlela leyi muchayeri ati khoma ha yona.
data.corrected_reference: Leswi tisaka ku vava hikuva, ku dyondza ndlela ya ku herisa nkwetlembetano swa tika hikuva awu nge yi vumbi hi ku tiyiseka ndlela leyi muchayeri ati khoma ha yona.

data.translation: Hi ku hatlisa, lava rhendzeleka timotoka va lava ku endla swilo hi ndlela leyi
data.original_reference: Leswi tsakisaka, ku toloveleke leswaku vachayeri va ti khoma yi ndlela leyi yiyelanaka; sweswo swi tolovele ku endla nkwetlembetano yi yelana naswona swi nga koteka ku yi kombisa hi ndlela leya yi nga tiyisekangiki ngopfu eka mathematiki.
data.corrected_reference: Leswi tsakisaka, ku toloveleke leswaku vachayeri va ti khoma yi ndlela leyi yiyelanaka; sweswo swi tolovele ku endla nkwetlembetano yi yelana naswona swi nga koteka ku yi kombisa hi ndlela leya yi nga tiyisekangiki ngopfu eka mathematiki.

data.translation: Ku kombisa kahle ku famba ka tindhawu, ku vekiwa vutihlamuleri exikarhi ka ti
data.original_reference: Ku kombisa kahle ndlela ya nkhuluko wa nkwetlembetano wa timovha, ku endliwe ntirhiswano eka swihlawulekisi swinharhu swa nkoka: (1) ku khuluka, (2)ntiko, (3) rivilo.
data.corrected_reference: Ku kombisa kahle ndlela ya nkhuluko wa nkwetlembetano wa timovha, ku endliwe ntirhiswano eka swihlawulekisi swinharhu swa nkoka: (1) ku khuluka, (2)ntiko, (3) rivilo.

data.translation: Timfanelo leti ti pfuna ku teka swiboho, ku endla swiboho, ni ku tirha

data.translation: Ku nga khathariseki leswaku AI yi ni vutihlamuleri lebyikulu bya ku fambisana
data.original_reference: Hambileswi AI yinga ku hlangana lokukulu na sayense ya switori swo anakanyiwa, AI yi vumba xiyenge xa nkoka swinene xa sayense ya tikhompyutha,leyi tirhaka hi mikhuva, ku dyondza ni vutlhari byo yi tirhisa eka michini.

data.translation: Rixaka ra ku hlaya ka AI ri katsa ku endla mashini leswaku ma endla swilo hi ndlela leyi
data.original_reference: Vulavisisi eka AI byi katsa ku endla michini leswaku yi kota ku endla swilo leswi lavaka mikhuva ya vutlhari.
data.corrected_reference: Vulavisisi eka AI byi katsa ku endla michini leswaku yi kota ku endla swilo leswi lavaka mikhuva ya vutlhari.

data.translation: Mixaka ya swona ku katsa ku lawula, ku endla nhluvuko ni ku hlela
data.original_reference: Swikombiso swi katsa ku lawula, ku hlela na ku longoloxa, vuswikoti by hlamula swivutiso swa vaxavi, hambi kuri ku vona laha ku tsariweke hi voka, rito ni xikandza.

data.translation: Swiyimo swo tano swi ve swiyimo swo hambana, leswi fambisanaka ni ku nyika ma
data.original_reference: Swilo sweswo swi endliwe tidyondzo leti hambaneke, leswi kongomaka eka ku tisa swi ntshuxo eka swiphiqo swa vutomi.
data.corrected_reference: Swilo sweswo swi endliwe tidyondzo leti hambaneke, leswi kongomaka eka ku tisa swi ntshuxo eka swiphiqo swa vutomi.

data.translation: Xiyenge xa AI xi endliwa sweswi emasin 'win'weni ta ku fambisa
data.original_reference: Fambiselo ra AI hakanyingi ri tirhisiwa eka tidyondzo ta ikhonomi, vutshunguri, injiniyara nile ta nyimpi, hilaha swi endliweke hakona eka tikhompyutha tale kaya ni le ka switirhisiwa swa sofutiwe ya mintlangu ya tividiyo.
data.corrected_reference: Fambiselo ra AI hakanyingi ri tirhisiwa eka tidyondzo ta ikhonomi, vutshunguri, injiniyara nile ta nyimpi, hilaha swi endliweke hakona eka tikhompyutha tale kaya ni le ka switirhisiwa swa sofutiwe ya mintlangu ya tividiyo.

data.translation: Ku famba hi xikolo i xiphemu lexikulu xa xikolo xin’wana na xin’
data.original_reference: Maendzo dyondzo i xiyenge lexikulu xa kamara rin’wana ni rin’wana ro dyondzela. Minkarhi yo tala mudyondzisi u rhandza ku yisa machudeni ya yena eka ndhawu leyi bazi ri nga fikeki.

data.translation: Ti teknoloji ti nyika nkongomiso hi ku ya eminhlanganweni. Vadzidziharisi va nga vona
data.original_reference: Thekinoloji yi nyika xintshuxo hi ku endla maendzo dyondzo yale ka inthanete. Machudeni va nga languta swilo swa vutshila swale muziyamu, va endzela ndhawu ya swiharhi swale matini, kumbe va navela swilo swa vutshila swo saseka va tshame ni vadyondzi kuloni.

data.translation: Ndlela yin’wana leyi a yi ta yi fambisa hi ku famba ka nkarhi a ku ri

data.original_reference: Swiharhi hinkwaswo leswi fikaka eka swihlala swi te laniwa hi ku hlambela, hi ku haha kumbe ku phaphamala.

data.translation: Hilaha ku fanaka, hi ku ya hi ku leha ka nkarhi lowu vaaki va misava va nga
data.original_reference: Hikwalaho ka mpfuka wo leha ku suka emisaveni swiharhi swo mamisa swi tsandzeke ku teka riendzo leswi endleke xibodye xiharhi lexi a Xi vundza eGalapagos.

data.translation: Ku sukela loko munhu a fika eGalapagos, swiharhi swo tala swa nyama swi hundze
data.original_reference: Ku sukela loko ku fike munhu eGalapagos, swiharhi swo tala leswi mamisaka swi ve kona ku katsa timbuti, tihanci, tihomu, makondlo, swimanga na timbyana.

data.translation: Loko u ya eArctic kumbe eAntarctic hi xihlovo u ta va u ri
data.original_reference: Loko u vhakela tindhawu ta Arctic kumbe ta Antarrctic hi xixika, u ta vona vusiku bya polar, leswi vulaka leswaku dyambu a ri humi.
data.corrected_reference: Loko u vhakela tindhawu ta Arctic kumbe ta Antarrctic hi xixika, u ta vona vusiku bya polar, leswi vulaka leswaku dyambu a ri humi.

data.translation: Loko swi ri tano swi ni nkarhi lowunene wo vona Aurora borealis, hikuva xivandzana
data.original_reference: Leswi swi nyiketa nkarhi wa kahle wa ku vona Aurora borealis, tanihi leswi xibakabaka xi ta va na xinyami ngopfu minkarhi hinkwayo.
data.corrected_reference: Leswi swi nyiketa nkarhi wa kahle wa ku vona Aurora borealis, tanihi leswi xibakabaka xi ta va na xinyami ngopfu minkarhi hinkwayo.

data.translation: Loko tindhawu ti ri ni vanhu vatsongo, naswona ku hlanganisiwa ka matimba a ku
data.original_reference: Tanihi leswi vanhu va nga tshami ku suhi ni ku suhi, ku toloveleke leswaku ku layita loku endliweke hi munhu ku nga vi ni swiphiqo, naswona u ta swikota ku tsakela tinyeleti.

data.translation: Ku tirhandzela ka ku tirhandzela ka Japan i ku tlula leswi Vatsonga va swi tirhisaka.
data.original_reference: Ndlela ya ku tirha ya le Japani yi landzelelana ngopfu naswona yi le nawini ku na leswi vanhu va le Vupela dyambu va swi toloveleke.
data.corrected_reference: Ndlela ya ku tirha ya le Japani yi landzelelana ngopfu naswona yi le nawini ku na leswi vanhu va le Vupela dyambu va swi toloveleke.

data.translation: Swilo leswi nga ni timfanelo leti fanaka swi va swiboho swa vukati, naswona vatirhi
data.original_reference: Tisuti i swiambalo leswi tolovelekeke eka vanhu vama bindzu, naswona vatirhikulobye va vitana hi xivongo kumbe xikhundla xa vona xa ntirho.

data.translation: Ku va ni nkongomiso eka ntirho i swa nkoka, ku kombisa ku tirhandzela ka ndyangu ku
data.original_reference: Ku tirhisana kahle entirhweni i swa nkoka ngopfu, ku tiyisekisa leswaku ku bumabumeriwa matshalatshala ya ntlawa ku ri na ku bumabumeriwa ka munhu hi wexe.

data.translation: Vatirhi va fanele va kuma ku hlawulekisa ka lava va va lawulaka hi xiboho
data.original_reference: Vatirhi va fanele va tshama va kuma ku tlangeriwa hi valawuri va vona eka xiboho xin’wana ni xin’wana lexi va xi tekaka, naswona ku languteriwe leswaku va yingisela swileriso swa valawuri handle ko kanakana.
